de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.gui.minigui

Class MiniGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.application.AbstractApplication
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.gui.minigui.MiniGUI

  • @Alias(value={"mini","minigui"})
public class MiniGUI
extends AbstractApplication
    Minimal GUI built around a table-based parameter editor.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
